module.name: pygame2.sdl.audio
module.desc: Pygame SDL audio subsystem wrapper module.

func.name: init
func.desc: Initializes the audio subsystem of the SDL library.

func.name: quit
func.desc:
Shuts down the audio subsystem of the SDL library.
After calling this function, you should not invoke any class, method or function related to the audio subsystem as they are likely to fail or might give unpredictable results.

func.name: was_init
func.desc: Returns, whether the audio subsystem of the SDL library is initialized.
